title: Desert X AlUla 2026: monumental land art exhibition opens in the ancient oasis of AlUla
description: ALULA, Saudi Arabia, Jan. 16, 2026 /PRNewswire/ -- Today marks the official opening of Desert X AlUla 2026, the landmark fourth edition of the international, open-air biennial exhibition. title: Fortescue buys US battery management tech to boost grid scale storage needs as it eliminates fossil fuels
description: Fortescue buys US battery controls company as it ramps up efforts to reach real zero in its massive mining operations and batteries play key role on grid and transport.The post Fortescue buys US battery management tech to boost grid scale storage needs as it eliminates fossil fuels appeared first on Renew Economy.

title: India’s hand-stitched vessel INSV Kaundinya retraces ancient maritime routes, reaches Oman
description: After 17 days at sea without engines or nails, the Indian Navy’s hand-stitched vessel INSV Kaundinya reached Muscat, retracing ancient maritime trade routes using traditional seafaring methods.

title: A study of the ancient built environment
description: A book of essays co-edited by history of art professor Mantha Zarmakoupi dives into a historic movement focused on recentering how we think about ecological concerns and the built environment.
